newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Shares in Cap Gemini hit new high.
newsitem.headline: Shares in Cap Gemini hit new high.

text.p: Shares in information technology (IT) firm Cap Gemini NV rose 5.80 guilders, touching an all-time high of 71.60 after the firm announced higher than expected first-half results late on Tuesday.
Cap Gemini reported a 30 percent rise in first-half 1997 net earnings after the bourse closed on Tuesday.

Dealers said the volume of trading in the shares was high and said the outlook for the industry looked buoyant, especially since the shortage of qualified IT staff did not seem as severe as previously thought.
At 1210 GMT the shares were 5.30 guilders or eight percent higher at 71.10.
Cap Gemini NV is majority owned by Cap Gemini SA of France.
